title: Chapter XXXI - Board of Real Estate Appraisal
content:
Chapter XXXI - Board of Real Estate Appraisal

State Regulations

Part 1101 - Scope Of Practice (§ 1101.1 to 1101.4)

Part 1102 - Qualifying Experience (§ 1102.1 to 1102.7)

Part 1103 - Qualifying Course Regulations (§ 1103.1 to 1103.16)

Part 1104 - Reciprocal/Temporary Certification and Licensing Reciprocal Certification and Reciprocal Licensing (§ 1104.1 to 1104.4)

Part 1105 - Real Estate Appraisal Examinations (§ 1105.1 to 1105.8)

Part 1106 - Uniform Standards Of Professional Appraisal Practice (§ 1106.1 to 1106.2 to 1106.3)

Part 1107 - Approval Of Real Estate Appraisal Continuing Education (§ 1107.1 to 1107.34)

Part 1108 - Repealed

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
